summary: Dwarven Steam Staff. 3 Versions - 15ish dps - 50ish - 100ish dps
descriptionHtml:
Required Mods - Immersive Weapons

For those who use Destruction Perks found in mods which increase Fire Damage, the lower staff should scale nicely with those, for those who don't there are 2 more powerful versions.

Casts Steam Breath at the Target for roughly 15,50,100 Damage Per Second - depending on version.
Is aimed at Destruction mages as it uses a lot of charge without Fortify Destruction Enchants

Simply Extract to Skyrim/Data

One problem with it is that the sound effect and visual finishes but because its a staff the spell continues and the impact effectalso continues. Also with the two lower version of the staff the image does not show up in inventory, this is because i opened only the plugin in creation kit and i didnt want to go back and fix it.

to aquire it use console code:- help ancient - then page up until you find the staff, probably the bottom weapon, the player.additem [itemcode]
author: Cuzimazz
